name: Sera: A Conversation-Based Siri\u00ae Parody Game for iOS 7
blurb: Story-based game app about a forgotten artificial intelligence smartphone assistant with mental health issues, for iPhone/iPad.

rewards.reward: The Galatea \u2014 GET AN EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATION ONLY AVAILABLE TO KICKSTARTER BACKERS! \u2014 Instead of just giving a donation, cash-poor automatons should get a Reward too! Throw Sera a Dollar and for your contribution you'll get an exclusive Conversation unlockable in the finished app* about the mythical Galatea! You'll also get the "Quarantine Notice" wallpapers, profile pictures, and Facebook cover image; along with exclusive access to the forums until launch (and a Kickstarter section afterwards).

The Cylon \u2014 2 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS AND A COPY OF THE GAME! \u2014 Become one of Sera\u2019s legion of Centurions with this special tier, which is the same as the $5 tier, but limited to 500 backers. Act now!

The Talos \u2014 2 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS AND A COPY OF THE GAME! \u2014 From what we can tell, Talos never really existed, but these Rewards are 100% real! For your contribution you'll receive an exclusive Talos-themed Conversation, and a copy of Sera for iPhone and iPod touch on iOS 7!

The ELIZA \u2014 4 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS INCLUDING A MAKING OF, AND A COPY OF THE GAME! \u2014 The ELIZA program frightened its creator, but don't be afraid of these Rewards! The ELIZA tier grants you: An exclusive ELIZA-themed Conversation and the Making Of Conversation, both accessible right inside the app. Oh, and all the previous Perks as well!

The Turing \u2014 5 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A CREDIT IN THE GAME, AND A "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER MAILED TO YOU! \u2014 You don't have to be a world famous cryptanalyst to decode why these Rewards are worth it! Contributors of Turing's caliber will receive: an exclusive Turing-themed Conversation, an attribution in the credits of the game, and a physical Cease and Desist letter mailed to your home or place of business (Could there be a secret within the letter to unlock an additional hidden Conversation? Contribute and see!). Why not take all the previous Perks too?

The K.I.T.T. \u2014 6 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, COPY OF THE GAME, A CREDIT IN THE GAME, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, AND A CUSTOM INTERFACE AND VOICE IN THE GAME! \u2014 I really wish I could provide a "sera car", but in lieu of that, we\u2019ll include the following Rewards: an exclusive \u201cK.I.T.T.\u201d Conversation, a custom \u201c2000\u201d UI for the Sera app, and a commentary track of the episode K.I.T.T. vs. K.A.R.R. by Sera! Plus it\u2019ll have a special voice module (fine, it\u2019s just a male British voice, but it\u2019ll be guaranteed to make you feel like Hasselhoff,** and you\u2019ll get all the lower tier perks too, okay?).

The HAL \u2014 GET 7 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A T-SHIRT, AND A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA \u2014 Be as visionary as Kubrick by investing in these pinnacle Perks. Not only will you get every previous Perk, but you'll also get the \u201cA Sandbox is something children play in\u201d t-shirt, an exclusive \u201cHAL\u201d Conversation, an exclusive \u201c9000\u201d UI, and an exclusive full-length audio commentary of 2001 from Sera\u2014it's her favourite movie! Well, she's only ever seen the first half of it...

The Deep Blue \u2014 GET 8 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA, AND 2 SHIRTS \u2014  They dismantled Deep Blue in its prime, but keep its spirit alive with these awesome Perks! These A.I. aficionados will receive: An exclusive \u201cDeep Blue\u201d Conversation, and the \u201cDeep Blue Blew Deep\u201d long sleeve. All previous Perks are yours as well (yes, this does mean both shirts!).

The Watson \u2014 GET 9 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA, 2 SHIRTS, PRE-RELEASE ACCESS, AND INPUT IN THE DESIGN \u2014  Watson may know more than you, but keep up the illusion of intellect by making this contribution and as a bonus you'll receive: A Watson-themed Conversation, access to pre-release builds (you might even be able to experience Conversations that get cut from the final release!) and up to 50 minutes of FaceTime conversations to give feedback. Plus, you\u2019ll \u201cwin\u201d all previous Perks. Get it?

The Lt. Cmd. Data \u2014 GET 10 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA, 2 SHIRTS, PRE-RELEASE ACCESS, INPUT IN THE DESIGN, AND A CONVERSATION BASED ON YOUR INTERESTS \u2014 Just like Data wanting to become more human, I want to give users the ability to become part of the game\u2019s story. I\u2019ll conduct an interview about topics you fancy and I\u2019ll base one of the Conversations in the game on you and one of your stories! Getting a Data-themed Conversation and all previous perks is a given at this point, right?

The GLaDOS \u2014 GET 11 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA, 2 SHIRTS, PRE-RELEASE ACCESS, INPUT IN THE DESIGN, A CONVERSATION BASED ON YOUR INTERESTS AND DINNER IN YOUR HOMETOWN! \u2014 I don\u2019t want you gone, I want you still alive! If you\u2019re this big a fan of fictitious A.I.s, I want to have dinner with you. Who knows, maybe \u201cSera\u201d will even show up? We\u2019ll do the interview for your Conversation, I\u2019ll take you through the app and some super-secret future plans. You\u2019ll also get a cool GLaDOS-themed Conversation, and unlike the cake, you getting all previous perks is no lie.

The SHODAN \u2014 GET 12 EXCLUSIVE CONVERSATIONS, A COPY OF THE GAME, AN END CREDIT, THE "CEASE AND DESIST" LETTER, 2 CUSTOM INTERFACES AND VOICES, A FILM COMMENTARY TRACK BY SERA, 2 SHIRTS, PRE-RELEASE ACCESS, INPUT IN THE DESIGN, A CONVERSATION BASED ON YOUR INTERESTS AND A WEEK-LONG NERD VACATION! \u2014 You either are a fictitious artificial intelligence fan, or you\u2019re not. If you know who the name of this Reward references, we should get together for a week-long vacation where we\u2019ll watch A.I. movies, play A.I. games, and you'll get an inside look into Sera\u2019s development and help shape the story (nerdy couples should both contribute this amount, trust me!). Plus, there will be an eventual SHODAN-themed Conversation only you will get. You\u2019ll also get the complete Reward package.
